newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan one-month NCDs average yield at 5.827.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan one-month NCDs average yield at 5.827.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank issued T$5 billion in 10-day negotiable certificates of deposit on Wednesday at an average yield of 5.827 percent, a central bank official said.
The range of the bids was between 5.800-5.873 percent.
